```{r}
library(regsim)

data(mtcars)
mtcars$cyl <- as.factor(mtcars$cyl)
```

```{r}
model <- lm(mpg ~ wt + cyl, mtcars)
summary(model)
```

```{r}
x <- list(
  wt = seq(1, 5),
  cyl = levels(mtcars$cyl)
)

sim <- regsim(model, x)
summary(sim)
```

```{r}
plot(sim, ~ wt + cyl, lines.col = "Set1", lines.lwd = 1.5)
```
